body_html: +1, this functionality would be super useful for some stuff I am working on. Specific use case: implementing Adaptive Computation Time from http://arxiv.org/abs/1603.08983, Graves, which requires a rnn cell which itself performs an undetermined number of internal iterations before progressing to the next timestep. As far as I can tell, this requires the use of two nested while loops, one via tf.scan and another for the internal iterations. Any other possible solutions/suggestions to get around this would be much appreciated!
